Class Menu

java.lang.Object
com.university.core.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
The main menu of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(UI ui, RunHistoryRepository runHistoryRepository, PlayerRepository playerRepository, IInputHandler inputHandler, Game game)
      Constructs a Menu instance with the provided dependencies.
      Parameters:
      ui - the UI instance for displaying messages and input prompts
      runHistoryRepository - the repository for accessing run history data
      playerRepository - the repository for accessing player data
      inputHandler - the input handler for reading user inputs
      game - the Game instance for starting a new game

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the main menu and handles user interaction. Users can select options to start a new game, view previous runs, or exit the game
